vulnerable_code: The code does not validate the certificate in any way.
description: The code does not check the validity of the certificate before using it. This could allow an attacker to present a forged certificate and decrypt the data.
recommendation: Use the certificate validation API to check the validity of the certificate before using it

vulnerable_code: The code uses DES encryption, which is not considered secure anymore.
description: DES is a weak encryption algorithm that is no longer considered secure. It is recommended to use a stronger encryption algorithm, such as AES.
recommendation: Use a stronger encryption algorithm, such as AES
